articles.description: Four engines, installed on a special stand inside the NASA testing facility, worked simultaneously for about one minute
articles.content:
NEW YORK, January 17. /TASS/. NASA specialists carried out test firing of the Space Launch System (SLS) carrier missile engines Saturday. The event was livestreamed on the NASA website.
Four engines… [+1051 chars]
